channel.title: Process on Newsboat Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Newsboat Blog

item.title: The Single Source
item.description:
Logs are for the future you. Tell the story so you can fix it fast.

The best workflows are boring and reliable. That reliability creates room for creative work.

Defaults are where trust accumulates. Make the safest option the easiest.

item.title: Shipping the Small Cut
item.description:
Defaults are where trust accumulates. Make the safest option the easiest.

Fewer surfaces, fewer surprises. Keep the path short and the intent obvious.

Keep the system small enough to see. When every step is visible, the next decision is easy.
